title: Collapse extra whitespace
original_prompt:
Remove the extra whitespace on these lines inserting a " - " instead:
$fa         minimum angle
$fs         minimum size
$fn         number of fragments
input1: $fa         minimum angle - $fs         minimum size - $fn         number of fragments
input2: $fa         minimum angle - $fs         minimum size - $fn         number of fragments - $ft         maximum thickness - $fw         width of feature
input1_ans: $fa - minimum angle - $fs - minimum size - $fn - number of fragments
$fa - minimum angle - $fs - minimum size - $fn - number of fragments
input2_ans: $fa - minimum angle - $fs - minimum size - $fn - number of fragments - $ft - maximum thickness - $fw - width of feature
$fa - minimum angle - $fs - minimum size - $fn - number of fragments - $ft - maximum thickness - $fw - width of feature
